ygData.subject: Re: When Titans collide
ygData.msgSnippet: Motormaster grabs the kick, which sends him closer to the edge of the cliff. He then tosses Megatron back, and is hit in the back by Cutthroat. As he falls to

Subject: Re: When Titans collide
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Motormaster grabs the kick, which sends him closer to the edge of the
cliff. He then tosses Megatron back, and is hit in the back by Cutthroat.
As he falls to his stomach, the seecond blast hits Megatron, sending him
down too. For a moment no one moves.

Speedbreaker arrives back at base with Stratus, and lets him go on the
ground. "Who's winning?" he questions, asking Dead End.

Megatron then stirs, and is met by a fist from Motormaster. Grinding of the
metal fist against his jaw fills his audio modules, and pain fills his
sensory receptors. Motormaster was always strong, he thought, but not
Megatron. As he finished his thought, he sent his fist, plunging it into
Motormaster. Motormaster's armor buckled under the raw power of the fist,
and indented, and when he recovered Megatron was on his feet. Megatron
moved in, and locked Motormasters hands. They pushed back and forth,
Motormaster teetering on the edge of the cliff. He then pushed back, and
they moved back from the cliff.

Megatron wanted to finish this now, and put all his power into another
push, the circuitry in both warriors hands crackled. Megatron freed one
hand from the death grip, and send it into Motormasters face. The impact
sent Motormaster backwards, and he slipped on the edge of the cliff,
loosing his balance. Before he could fall, Megatron grabbed him by the
shoulder. "This ends now Motormaster" he snarled, and sent one last fist
into Motormaster, and gravity pulled him down the cliff.

He picked up speed, and then hit a jagged rock at the bottom hard, and
stopped moving. Megatron smiled, he hadnt felt battle in a long while, and
enjoyed the strong fight against Motormaster.
